item.title: Hack your Mind: Remember Everything
item.description: Hack your Mind: Remember Everything Mon, May 11, 2020 helicopter, electric range, Newfoundland, albino, retrovirus, wheelbarrow, battery, tractor, fox, hypotenuse, slender, elm, stone, harmony, lint, banana, ladder It took me 40 seconds to remember this sequence and I could repeat it months after I learned it. It’s from an episode of “The Mentalist” (Season 7 Episode 3 at 10:10). It showed me the real power of a technique called “Memory Palace”.
